name: Red Revenge
description:
WHAT IS RED REVENGE?

Red Revenge is an FPS with a cartoonish style that is based in the little Red Riding Hood story.

The main goal of this game is killing the wolves in the forest where she lives, with an apple bazooka made of candy, while dodging traps and enemies to reach her final destination, her granny’s house.

STORY

The little Red Riding Hood was happily walking through the forest going to visit her grandma, like every weekend…

When suddenly she notices a strange smell coming from the bushes, she approaches to take a look and…

AAAAAAAAAHHHH!!!!

GRANNY!!!!

The evil wolves have killed granny while she was picking apples...

It’s time to go home… to get revenge.

GAMEPLAY

As said before, Red Revenge is an FPS with a cartoonish style, located in the little Red Riding Hood story.

Riding hood’s gun is an apple bazooka made entirely of candy, matching the game’s aesthetic.

The enemies are wolves wandering in the map, they will start following the player in sight, there are different types of wolves, betas and alphas, the alphas will deal more damage and will be harder to kill. There are traps that you’ll have to avoid if you don’t want to get hurt.

There are some power-up’s that will help the player beat the game easier: there is a speed boost power-up so the player can dodge the wolves’ attacks easier and there is a heal if the player is injured after a battle, but be careful, there’s only one heal in all the level, so you better watch out when you take it.
